tweet: As a two-time cancer survivor and a dad of two kids with Crohn's disease, I know first-hand how outrageously expensive health care is. The #MedicareforAll Act is the solution, and I'm proud to join @RepJayapal, @RepDebDingell and over 100 of our colleagues as a cosponsor.

The very first piece of legislation that I introduced in Congress would reverse a Trump administration rule that weakens workplace injury reporting requirements. We must have the most and best information possible on workplace injuries so that we can know how to prevent them.
This Workers Memorial Day, let’s honor the workers who lost their lives on the job and recommit to making every workplace one that affirms workers’ dignity and value. #1USafety

It seems like there is no respite from terrorism, with widespread bombings and suicide attacks aimed at Christians on Easter Sunday across Sri Lanka. My heart goes out to every single person affected, even as my intention to find effective ways to reduce violence redoubles.

Tonight we will gather for our Passover Seder and recommit ourselves to the fight for justice for all people (“for we were once slaves in Egypt”) — based on facts, science, truth, and the wisdom we struggle to derive therefrom.

Happy Good Friday, Passover and Easter to all!
